1.text: But concerning the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that aught be written unto you.

2.text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

3.text: When they are saying, Peace and safety, then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall in no wise escape.

4.text: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief:

5.text: for ye are all sons of light, and sons of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness;

6.text: so then let us not sleep, as do the rest, but let us watch and be sober.

7.text: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that are drunken are drunken in the night.

8.text: But let us, since we are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for a helmet, the hope of salvation.

9.text: For God appointed us not unto wrath, but unto the obtaining of salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,

10.text: who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

11.text: Wherefore exhort one another, and build each other up, even as also ye do.

12.text: But we beseech you, brethren, to know them that labor among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

13.text: and to esteem them exceeding highly in love for their workâ€™s sake. Be at peace among yourselves.

14.text: And we exhort you, brethren, admonish the disorderly, encourage the fainthearted, support the weak, be longsuffering toward all.

15.text: See that none render unto any one evil for evil; but always follow after that which is good, one toward another, and toward all.

18.text: in everything give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus to you-ward.

21.text: prove all things; hold fast that which is good;

22.text: abstain from every form of evil.

23.text: And the God of peace himself sanctify you wholly; and may your spirit and soul and body be preserved entire, without blame at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

24.text: Faithful is he that calleth you, who will also do it.

26.text: Salute all the brethren with a holy kiss.

27.text: I adjure you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the brethren.

28.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
